description: Enterprise techniques used by Winnti, ATT&CK software S0141 v1.0
name: Winnti (S0141)

techniques.comment: A Winnti implant file was named ASPNET_FILTER.DLL, mimicking the legitimate ASP.NET ISAPI filter DLL with the same name.
Winnti sets its DLL file as a new service in the Registry to establish persistence.
The Winnti installer loads a DLL using rundll32.
